page.title: 02ROUTINE AT MOELFRE SCHOOL
page.content: School begins at 9am and ends at 3.30pm. When the automatic bell rings at 9am, the teachers mark the registers and collect dinner money. Assembly is in the music room. We also say prayers before dinner and at home time. We have three playtimes, 10.35am-10.50am, 12.15pm-1.15pm, 2.30pm-2.40pm. There are about 130 children , six teachers. There are three teaching areas with two classes in each. Each area has reading areas and areas for practical work. In the hall we have gym, dinner, and concerts. We have a music room for music and television. It is a Community School and has a public library, a day-care centre for the elderly and a voluntary nursery school. Joanna Pentith.
